p: Andrographis extract (various and not standardized), andrographolide, and its derivatives have been studied in the treatment of various disease (multiple sclerosis, infection disease, gastro-intestinal upsets, respiratory ailments, pain), and in the maintenance of immune function. In this last context, it seemed to improve the response to cough and sore throat, shortening the sick leave/time to resolution [ 219]. The most interesting activity is the increase of CD4+ lymphocyte levels, in HIV-positive patients [ 211]. The increase in these lymphocytes testifies an improvement in the state of the immune system. Moreover, a Chinese product containing andrographolide improved the efficacy of glucocorticoids and immunoglobulin in patients with severe hand, food, and mouth disease.
